|brand = ASUS |model = DSL-AC88U |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (A) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC3150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = dsl modem, wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM63138; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex A9 (v7l) rev 1 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 1.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 60:45:CB |oui = 60:45:CB
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = CFE;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.42 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = ADSL2+, VDSL2, MU-MIMO, 1024QAM, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = VR9517U |manuf_rev = AC44 A-ASU |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/29/2017 |reldate = <!-- Release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B06XWYYK32 |asin_country = GB |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4366E; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 2167 |rad1n = 600 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4366E; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 1000 |rad2n = 600 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{see also|ASUS DSL-AC3100|ASUS DSL-AC87VG}}
<small> *'''Ultra-Fast Wi-Fi''' :Features [[Broadcom acqam|acqam]] (1024-QAM) technology to deliver a combined speed :of up to 3167 Mbps for bandwidth-intensive tasks. *'''Future-Proof DSL Compatibility''' :Supports ADSL, ADSL 2/2+, VDSL2, and the latest G.fast broadband connections. *'''Total Flexibility with DSL or Ethernet Internet Connections''' :Has multiple ways to connect to the internet with a choice of DSL for an ADSL/VDSL :connection or an Ethernet port for any fiber or cable-based modems, which makes :it ideal for a future ISP upgrade. </small>
===Additional specifications=== * '''Product segment''': AC3100 (2167+1000 Mbps) * '''Processor''': Broadcom BCM63138 :@1GHz (Dual Core ARM Cortex-A9) * '''Memory''': 128MB NAND Flash/512MB DDR3 RAM * '''Antenna''': 4x detachable antenna (3dBi) :The device has RP-SMA connectors. * '''Ports''': xDSL: 1x xDSL (RJ11) :WAN: 1x GbE (RJ45) 10/100/1000 BaseT :LAN: 4x GbE (RJ45) 10/100/1000 BaseT :USB: 1x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0 * '''Power Adapter''': :AC Input : 100~240V (50/60Hz) :DC Output : 19V / 3.42A *'''Dimensions''' (W x D x H): [[Dimensions::292 mm x 180 mm x 61 mm]] *'''Weight''': [[Weight::795 g]]
==Links of Interest== ===Spec. aggregators=== *[https://bc.whirlpool.net.au/bc/hardware/?action=h_view&model_id=1758 On '''Whirlpool'''] *[https://www.speedguide.net/routers/asus-dsl-ac88u-ac3100-dual-band-adslvdsl-gigabit-3841 On '''Speedguide''']
===Reviews=== *[https://www.eteknix.com/asus-dsl-ac88u-ac3100-adslvdsl-modem-router-review ''ASUS DSL-AC88U AC3100 ADSL/VDSL Modem Router'' on '''eTeknix''']
===Forum threads=== *[https://forums.whirlpool.net.au/forum-replies.cfm?t=2606692 ''ASUS DSL-AC88U'' on '''Whirlpool''' forums] (EN) :(Latest beta firmware available from above forum) *[http://www.hwupgrade.it/forum/showthread.php?t=2815459 ''ASUS DSL-AC88U'' on '''HWupgrade''' forums] (IT) :[http://www.hwupgrade.it/forum/showthread.php?t=2640545 ''ASUS DSL Routers'' on '''HWupgrade''' forums] (IT) *[https://www.adslgr.com/forum/threads/976816-DSL-AC88U?langid=1 ''ASUS DSL-AC88U Router'' on '''ADSLGR''' forums] (GR) *[http://www.turkeyforum.com/satforum/showthread.php?t=781430 ''ASUS DSL-AC88U'' on '''TurkeyForum Community''' forums] (TR)
==See also== *[[ASUS DSL-AC3100]] • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/DSL-AC3100/ Product page] *ASUS DSL-AC88U(A/B) • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/DSL-AC88U/ Product page] :[[Arcadyan]] VR9517UAC44-A-ASU *[[ASUS DSL-AC87VG]] • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/DSL-AC87VG/ Product page] :[[Arcadyan]] VRV9510RWAC34-1-B-ASU *[[ASUS DSL-AC750]] • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/DSL-AC750/ Product page] *[[ASUS DSL-AC68VG]] • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/DSL-AC68VG/ Product page] :AC2300 (600+1625 Mbps), VDSL2, USB 3.0 *[[ASUS DSL-AC68U]] • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/DSL-AC68U/ Product page] *[[ASUS DSL-AC56U]] • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/DSL-AC68U/ Product page] *[[ASUS DSL-AC55U]] • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/DSL-AC55U/ Product page] *[[ASUS DSL-AC52U]] • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/DSL-AC52U/ Product page] *[[ASUS DSL-AC51]] • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/DSL-AC51/ Product page]
